term.title: batch reactor

item.text: In a batch reactor the reactants and the catalyst are placed in the reactor which is then closed to transport of matter and the reaction is allowed to proceed for a given time whereupon the mixture of unreacted material together with the products is withdrawn. Provision for mixing may be required.
